game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the Lost Artifact from the Dragon's Lair
game.description: The artifact known as the 'Heart of the Mountain' has been stolen by the Dragon of the East. Retrieve it at all costs.

tasks.description: Travel through the perilous Dark Forest, cross the Treacherous River, and ascend the Steep Mountain to reach the Dragon's Lair.
Confront the Dragon and retrieve the Heart of the Mountain.
